content: अंह् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> अंहते, अंहितुं To go; approach; set out, <ls>Bk. 3. 25</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 3.">46</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 51</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">4. 4</ls>. &c. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To send; तमांजिहन्मैथिलयज्ञभूमिं <ls>Bk. 2. 40</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 75.</ls> {@--2@} To shine. {@--3@} To speak.
